document.full_text: "thor", the first of several superheroes debuting on movie screens this summer, hits u.s. theaters on friday with out-sized hopes resting on the norse deity's expansive shoulders.
document.title: "thor" thunders into superhero movie summer
lines_and_colors: "thor", the first of several superheroes debuting on movie screens this summer, hits u.s. theaters on friday with out-sized hopes resting on the norse deity's expansive shoulders.
